string.text: Lucious, I cannot see well.. some kind of blowout I've never seen before.. heading underground as I cannot stay out here long.. will send coordizthhh sstchss..
The storm has changed! It appears some areas are now safe to reenter! Can't wait to see what's out there..
The storm has changed again.. it looks like only the NPP area is still effected!
The storm has stopped! All readings indicate that even the NPP is safe again! On my way there now!
Marked One.. the item to repair is available, pick it up whenever..
Hard core trader in the far Northeast of the Zone, nothing else known about him.
Just that it has engulfed the regions around the Power Plant, I have not talked to anyone that has been in it.
I really need to go into the storm areas, got any ideas how?
Maybe underground but I would have no idea where or how..
Not good enough as I need to go above ground to find what I am looking for.
Well.. maybe Lanky could put a suit together for you that might protect your ass.. wouldn't want your brains to fry..
Full of jokes, aren't you Barman.. but then that's what you do best, eh..
This storm is really starting to get on my nerves!
From your appearance I would have quessed you've been on vacation in the Riviera..
Yea, yea.. and you're still the same pain in the a..
Say.. you heard the news? Seems that that AX fellow got himself caught out in the open for too long..
What happened to him and where?
No idea if he is dead or worse but I do know he was trying to get something from the generators up North when it happened.
Another jaunt into the storm! I must find out what happened to him and if he was after MY SOUL CUBE!..
How's life these days, old friend?
Pretty dull.. just my style, and you?
Same as always.. looking for trouble in all the wrong places..
Hmm.. well try and keep it out of here, eh..
It is one of those WRONG PLACES.. but I'll let you off the hook this time.
AHHH... aren't you the sensetive one..
Is there any way I can get a suit that would protect me from this storm?
I have one that I just finished using a special artifact.
I need it! What will it take to get it from you?
If you can replace the artifact I used then I will let you be the first to test it..
TEST IT!!! Damn if I can't ever get a break! What artifact do you want?

Very rare.. Mushroom Artifact.. get me one and the suit is yours. A stalker told me that there may be one in Facility F1 near a rare anti-gravity anomoly. He said he could not get at it as much as he tried.. might try some of the old Labs too.
Hmmm.. OK I will get you one but I have to say that suit must be GOLD plated!!!
I need a suit for the storm.
I see that you have a Mushroom artifact, good, you can have the suit.
A Mushrrom artifact is a hefty price for a prototype, it better work!
You don't have to make the trade.. you can try and get around like a Gopher in the undergrounds..
Crap.. not much choice, do I?
Excellent! But do be warned.. there is a maximum amount of time you can be in the storm before the suit starts to weaken so make your visits brief.
Always some kind of condition! Why can't you geeks ever get anything 100%.. You enjoy this, don't you!
I need you to fix my suit.
You need a Mushroom Artifact, then I can fix the suit.
You think those things grow on trees?.. OK, I'll be back.
I need you to fix my suit.
I see that you have a Mushroom Artifact, good, give me the suit.
When do I get it back?
When I get it done.. when did you think? moron..
Just get it done soon and make sure it is done well!
WOW.. about time.. give it to me.
Nice to see you too, Sparticus..
Just remember me that way and we should get along just fine! oh.. and thanks for the suit back..
Why you in such a crappy mood?
This storm is costing me alot of business is what!
How did the suit work? I have a job for you if you're able to go into the NPP.
That's the heart of the storm, what could be that valuable?
Mushroom Artifacts of course, being near the NPP Generators they have been baked by the storm and have become extremely powerful.. fetch top dollar!
I need some myself so if there are any extra I will get them for you.. at top dollar that is!
Sure, I need as many as you've got.
Sure glad that storm has weakened!
Yea.. but that mad rush back into the outer edges of it is causing alot of mayhem!
Most of them have no idea what's in there and are in for quite a nightmare..
Keep the nightmares to yourself and have a drink.
Hey Sid, any news to tell?
Only thing anyone cares about around here is that storm.
it is strange.. wonder what caused it..
Sure as Hell I don't know but I sure hope it burns itself out and doesn't come this way!
Sid old friend.. how's life in the after storm?
Marked One! Good to see you! What the Hell have you been up to?
Same old crap.. although I probably saved the world a couple times but eh.. who's counting..
I was going to offer you a drink.. but I think maybe you had enough already!
What are you guarding way out here?
Nothing.. just waiting for friends of mine.
Seems like you've been stood up.. heard any news lately?
HA, good one.. but yea I did hear something really strange.. somebody stole a troop carrier in F1 and it is rumored to be loaded down with gold bars.
Where do you think it went? Aren't you interested in looking for it?
HELL NO! I wouldn't go anywhere near that hotbed, probably a lie anyway..
